title: Music Player (+ YouTube) PRO v2.9 build 113 (Boom)
description:
About Boom Music Player + YouTube 
Boom Player is a sleek yet powerful music player that combines YouTube and Social Media features with those of a fully featured music and video player all in your Android smartphone to give you an explosive media experience.

In addition to accessing your local Music Library. Boom Player also provides users with an integrated music discovery service allowing you the user to discover the latest urban music (Hip-hop, R&B, Pop, Dance-hall, Reggae and more), videos and remixes everyday!

Stay in the loop with daily updates and alerts to your Android device and stream music and videos for free!

-------------------------------------

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enhanced YouTube music playback (repeat and shuffle your favorite YouTube music videos).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add or remove songs from your YouTube playlists. f000h

-------------------------------------
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple Skins Support.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ID3 Tag Editing.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flac and other non standard format integration.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Folder Playback.

Formats Supported:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ mp3, mp4, m4a, aac, aiff, ogg, wma*, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mov, 3gp, flv and more.


WARNING: YouTube logo (if any) is used for informational purpose only. YouTube and YouTube Logo are trademarks and properties of Google Inc. This application is not associated or sponsored by Google Inc.


Please visit and like the Boom Player Facebook page for news, updates, technical support and more.

Thank you for supporting Boom Player. We hope you have an explosive media experience!

Recent changes:
New Features:
- Added compatibility for Android's default lock screen music controls. Now you can take control of Boom Player from the lock screen.
Changes/Fixes:
- Cached List meta data is now automatically restored if user data has been cleared
- Resolved issues with the use of headset controls to control music, all headsets (bluetooth and non-bluetooth) can now control your playback in Boom Player.
- More efficient music streaming and media art downloading to save on data usage
